template.template: Template IBM - BC_AMM - SNMP - Chassis Stats
template.name: Template IBM - BC_AMM - SNMP - Chassis Stats

item.name: chassis stats - main status
item.description:
In the MIB, I was able to found that the following oid where the status:
For RSA: '1.3.6.1.4.1.2.3.51.1.2.7.1.0' For Blade Center: '1.3.6.1.4.1.2.3.51.2.2.7.1.0'
When you do an SNMP get on this, you'll have one of the following value:
0 for Critical 2 for Warning 4 for System Error 255 for Normal.
To have details about the cause of the status, you should look at the following SNMP table:
For RSA: 1.3.6.1.4.1.2.3.51.1.2.7.2.1.3 For Blade Center: '1.3.6.1.4.1.2.3.51.2.2.7.2.1.3'
http://sysmgt.blogspot.cz/2009/03/ibm-remote-supervisor-adapter.html
https://github.com/sileht/check_mk/blob/master/checks/blade_health

trigger.name: "Front Panel Temp" is too high on {HOST.NAME}
Main chassis status is "System Error" on {HOST.NAME}
Status of "Power Domain 1" is not "good" on {HOST.NAME}
Status of "Power Domain 2" is not "good" on {HOST.NAME}
